short_desc: Free legal services for mentally disabled homeless persons. Legal assistance with public benefits (SSI, SSDI, Medi-Cal, CalWORKs, GA, Food Stamps and CAPI). Legal advice and referrals for non-benefits issues as well
description: Provides free legal assistance with public benefits programs: Supplemental Security Income (SSI), Social Security Disability Insurance (SSDI), Medi-Cal, CalWorks, General Assistance (GA), Food Stamps, and Cash Assistance Programs for Immigrants (CAPI). Also provides informal advice and referrals for non-benefits related legal issues.
